Quickstrike:




Quickstrike didn't have it simple with this job. The struggled with 
the wires at was rigged up into the detionators attached to them. He 
connected the wires in beast mode, which didn't make this any more 
easier. His bulky claws made operations like this difficult. He 
worked on it for a while, getting frustrated at some points.

After finishing with the lining down the corridors, he went to the 
engine room. He set up a few connected detionators there. Once the 
controler was pressed, they would all detionate in unison. 

He transformed to robot mode, taking a look around first. He opened 
his comm-link to Black Arachnia. "All finished. What now, sugar-bot?"
